Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I have a very annoying bug on the orbit map : sometimes the altitude of the periapsis and the apoapsis on an orbit change when I'm on the 1x speed but stay the same when I change the speed.

It means that sometimes, I do a maneuver node, everything is perfect, and suddendly the orbit change without me doing anything. Each times I have to restart the game and the bug disappear.

I have installed "Better time wrap continued", "Kerbal Engineer Redux", "KSP-AVC Plugin", "Docking Port alignment Indicator" and "Kerbal Alarm Clock".

Sorry if my sentences or my spelling are not right, I'm not a native english speaker.

Thanks you.
